title: [Revalos' Magic Shoppe]
[Revalos' General Store]
description: Enclosed by tar-splotched pine walls, the shop features a miniature Solhaven Bay model in the center of its light pine floor.  A curl-edged vellum wall map hangs under the driftwood ceiling.  Right near the front is a glass-covered box case and a salt-stained warped fishing crate.
